import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import"../styles/home.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const URL='https://6666c4dca2f8516ff7a4d335.mockapi.io/staffManagement';const Home=()=>{const[staffs,setStaffs]=useState([]);const[detailPopup,setDetailPopup]=useState(null);const getListStaff=async()=>{const res=await axios.get("".concat(URL));if(res.status===200){setStaffs(res.data);}};useEffect(()=>{getListStaff();},[]);// popup
const handleViewPopup=staff=>{setDetailPopup(staff);};const handleClosePopup=()=>{setDetailPopup(null);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[staffs&&staffs.map(staff=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:staff.avatar,alt:staff.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:staff.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleViewPopup(staff),children:"View Details"})]},staff.id)),detailPopup&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"popup",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"popup-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"close",onClick:handleClosePopup,children:"\xD7"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:detailPopup.avatar,alt:detailPopup.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["ID: ",detailPopup.id]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Name: ",detailPopup.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Age: ",detailPopup.age]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Address: ",detailPopup.Address]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["CreatedAt: ",new Date(detailPopup.createdAt*1000).toLocaleDateString()]})]})})})]});};export default Home;
